item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

All you had to do was add

if(inMinigame()) { c.wildLevel = 200; }

If all you did was turn what Ruby stated in config to true it’ll fuck up your wilderness…

item.title: PvP Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @reyes2303 reyes2303
item.description:
@reyes2303 wrote:

Ok so I made a minigame kinda and I it’s where one team is on one side of the playing field and the other on the opposite side. I have a store with materials in each teams safezone. I added multi and pvp zones over the whole playing field but when we go into the playing field it says we are in -60 wildy level. I want to remove this completely so that a 138 can attack a lvl 3. Right now a level 138 can’t even attack a 138. It say’s to great of a difference.

public boolean inWild() { if(isInFala() || inFunPk()) { return true; } if(absX > 2510 && absX < 2552 && absY > 9421 && absY < 9467 || absX > 2510 && absX < 2552 && absY > 9421 && absY < 10367){ return true; } if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3968 || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10367){ return true; } return false; }

Read full topic
